title: Enterprise Employee Listening Program
summary: Designed and launched the organization's first global employee listening program, building scalable infrastructure to capture sentiment across all business units.
challenge: No enterprise-wide employee feedback mechanism had existed for several years, leaving leadership without actionable data to drive workforce engagement strategy.
whatIBuilt: Designed and launched the organization's first global employee listening program, building scalable infrastructure to capture sentiment across all business units and generate executive-level insights.
impact: Engaged 40,000+ employees, generated actionable insights at scale, and drove a 110%+ improvement in employee engagement scores—directly informing enterprise strategy.

title: Talent Acquisition & HR Transformation
summary: Led organizational effectiveness analysis and redesigned end-to-end hiring workflows to deliver 8-figure impact through labor efficiencies.
challenge: The candidate journey was fragmented with process bottlenecks that impacted compliance, slowed hiring velocity, and created inefficiencies across distributed HR operations.
whatIBuilt: Led organizational effectiveness analysis and redesigned end-to-end hiring workflows—eliminating bottlenecks, improving compliance, and strengthening operational accountability across the enterprise.
impact: Delivered 8-figure impact through labor efficiencies, significantly reduced recruitment costs, and improved time-to-productivity for new hires at scale.

title: High-Volume Recruiting Turnaround
summary: Led operational turnaround through workforce planning and productivity redesign for an organization supporting 30,000+ hires annually.
challenge: The internal recruiting organization supporting 30,000+ hires annually was underperforming with extended cycle times and inefficient operations impacting business readiness.
whatIBuilt: Led operational turnaround through workforce planning and productivity redesign. Co-developed proprietary recruiting technology to maintain hiring velocity during unprecedented market disruption.
impact: Reduced hiring cycle time by 70%+, achieved 5x improvement in team productivity metrics, and delivered 7-figure annualized cost savings through operational efficiency.

title: Product Innovation & Revenue Growth
summary: Conducted targeted user research and led product development to systematically re-engage dormant applicants, generating 7-figure incremental revenue.
challenge: The platform faced challenges with applicant re-engagement, missing opportunities to unlock value from existing talent pools and drive incremental revenue.
whatIBuilt: Conducted targeted user research to identify pain points, led product development to systematically re-engage dormant applicants, and delivered executive presentations to secure stakeholder alignment.
impact: Launched new product capability that generated 7-figure incremental revenue by unlocking value from existing customer databases.
